II. Purpose of Addendum
Effective 7/30/2007 this agency has relocated within the same area to 3400 S.
Washington, Saginaw, MI 48601. The licensee is in the process of consolidating a
number of program operations at this new location.
III. Methodology
An onsite review was conducted on 7/27/2007.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The new facility will accommodate all of the child placing agency program operations
previously licensed at the 705 Hoyt St. location.
V. Recommendation
I recommend approval for the change in address for license CB730200994 effective
7/30/2007.
